General.Name: Salee Printing Public Company Limited
General.Description: Salee Printing Public Company Limited provides label printing services in Thailand, Myanmar, and internationally. The company provides extended text, self-adhesive, and shrink sleeve labels. It offers packaging solutions for home and personal care, health care, food, beverages, and specialty labels. Salee Printing Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Pathumthani, Thailand. Salee Printing Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Salee Industry Public Company Limited.
General.Address: 19, Moo 10, Tumbol Klong Si, Pathum Thani, Thailand, 12120
